subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4777 is on the way
description_text:
Hi, Can you check that the tracking number is correct? The courier’s website gives an error saying that the goods have not yet been picked up. Thanks Stu Sent from my iPhone On 13 Dec 2025, at 8:07 pm, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 







 
 Your order is on the way 
 
 
 
 


 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Order #SSN4777
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Your order is on the way 
 Your order is on the way. Track your shipment to see the delivery status. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 View your order 
 
 
 
 
 
 or Visit our store
 
 
 


 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 SF Express tracking number: SF6047167543901
 
 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Items in this shipment 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional × 1 

 
 Plus X P2-H2 / Black / Baseplate 
 

 
 
 
 Part of: Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional 
 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 



 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1 

 
 VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) 
 

 
 
 
 Part of: Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional 
 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Stuart Murray,    We apologize for the inconvenience. The tracking number is correct, but the warehouse may not have completed packaging yet. I will urge them to ship it out as soon as possible.
